title: CSV Analyzer
description: An application that takes a CSV file as input and attempts to guess its contents and purpose

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Upload CSV file and display analysis results

pages.name: Analysis
pages.purpose: Display detailed analysis of the uploaded CSV file

ui_components: Text area to display analysis results
interactions: User clicks button to trigger analysis
User interacts with table and chart to explore data
acceptance_criteria: App successfully uploads and parses CSV file
App stores user settings across sessions
